meanings.definition: A playing card bearing a representation of a soldier or servant.
meanings.sent1: In the game, I picked a jacks card with a soldier on it.
meanings.sent2: She collected jacks cards with different soldiers and servants.
meanings.sent3: The jacks card with the soldier made the game more interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her jacks card, depicting a servant, seemed to bring her luck.
meanings.sent5: The jacks card showing a soldier was her favorite in the deck.

meanings.definition: A small, six-pointed metal object used in the game of jacks.
meanings.sent1: I found a shiny jacks while playing the game.
meanings.sent2: The kids played with the jacks on the playground.
meanings.sent3: His jacks bounced higher than anyone else's during the game.
meanings.sent4: The jacks gleamed under the sunlight as they were tossed in the air.
meanings.sent5: She practiced her hand-eye coordination by playing with the jacks.

meanings.definition: A device for lifting heavy objects, typically consisting of a tripod or a pair of supports with a projecting bar or claw.
meanings.sent1: The workers used jacks to lift the heavy boxes.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic brought out the jacks to raise the car.
meanings.sent3: The jacks made the task of lifting the piano much easier.
meanings.sent4: With the help of the jacks, they effortlessly lifted the furniture.
meanings.sent5: The jacks were essential tools for moving the heavy equipment.

meanings.definition: A socket with two or more pairs of pins that can be plugged into a corresponding socket to make a connection.
meanings.sent1: He plugged the cable into the jacks to connect the devices.
meanings.sent2: The jacks on the back of the TV allowed for multiple connections.
meanings.sent3: The jacks made it convenient to link various gadgets together.
meanings.sent4: She carefully inserted the cable into the jacks for a secure connection.
meanings.sent5: The jacks on the stereo system enabled seamless integration with other devices.
